thread.title: Japan's Monex offers to buy cryptocurrency exchange Coincheck - Nikkei

title: Japan's Monex offers to buy cryptocurrency exchange Coincheck - Nikkei
text:
April 3, 2018 / 4:33 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago Japan's Monex offers to buy cryptocurrency exchange Coincheck: Nikkei Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
TOKYO (Reuters) - Japanese online broker Monex Group Inc has proposed a plan to buy Coincheck Inc, the local cryptocurrency exchange hit recently by a high-profile $530 million theft of digital money, Nikkei business reported on Tuesday. FILE PHOTO: Cryptocurrency exchange Coincheck's signboard is pictured in front of a building where their office is located in Tokyo, Japan February 2, 2018. REUTERS/Kim Kyung-Hoon/File Photo 
Monex would pay several billion yen for Coincheck, with an announcement expected to come as early as this week, the Nikkei said. 
Shares in Monex jumped 23 percent by the daily limit, to 424 yen in Tokyo. 
(This story has been refiled to fix typographical error in second paragraph) Reporting by Taiga Uranaka; Editing by Chang-Ran Kim
